name: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Commit Safeguard
description: Checks last 10 commits to prevent duplicate squash merges or accidental double commits.
script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

main() {
  echo "[safeguard] Checking last 10 commits..."

  commits=$(git log -n 10 --pretty=format:'%s')
  last_commit=$(echo "$commits" | head -n1)
  prev_commit=$(echo "$commits" | sed -n '2p')

  if [ "$last_commit" = "$prev_commit" ]; then
    echo "âŒ Duplicate commit detected: '$last_commit' == '$prev_commit'"
    echo "[safeguard] Aborting merge to avoid double-squash."
    exit 1
  fi

  echo "âœ… Safe: No duplicate commits detected."
}

main "$@"
